amendment.description: To increase funding for the Office of Science of the Department of Energy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3095 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3095 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S475; text: CR S475) To increase funding for the Office of Science of the Department of Energy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3095 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
